hook:
BUILDING THE OPEN INFRASTRUCTURE FOR AI AGENTS.

The best developer tools don't exist in a vacuum — they integrate.
body:
This week, we merged 7 PRs focused on connecting Pollinations with the broader agentic ecosystem and refining our developer experience.

Here is what shipped:

1. OPENCLAW INTEGRATION
We launched a dedicated landing page and streamlined the setup script. It now includes auto-onboarding and full branding support. If you are building autonomous agents, the friction just dropped to near zero.

2. UNIFIED DEV EXPERIENCE
Context switching kills flow. We merged our Documentation directly into the 'Play' page. You can now read the docs and test the API in the same window.

3. SMARTER EXECUTION
Updated our gateway to support Gemini's executable code blocks. The models aren't just generating text anymore — they are writing and running code.

4. SECURITY HARDENING
We tightened 'Polly' against prompt leakage. Open source means transparent, not vulnerable.

We are seeing 500+ apps built on our platform because we treat developers as partners, not just users.

Are you building agents or just chatting with bots?
cta: Start building for free at pollinations.ai
